org.seedstack.scheduler

Annotation Type Scheduled


  • @Inherited
 @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface Scheduled

    Scheduled annotates Task to specified scheduling information. 

      @Scheduled("0/2 * * * * ?")
 public class MyTask implements Task<Integer> {
     ...
 }

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Fields and Description
      static String DEFAULT 

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      ExceptionPolicy exceptionPolicy
      Defines the behavior when exception occurs during the task exception.
      int priority 
      boolean requestRecovery 
      boolean storeDurably 
      String taskName
      The Task name, must be unique within the group.
      String timeZoneId 
      String triggerName 
      String value 

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT

        public static final String DEFAULT

    • Element Detail

      • taskName

        public abstract String taskName
        The Task name, must be unique within the group.
        Returns:
        Task name
        Default:
        "DEFAULT"

      • requestRecovery

        public abstract boolean requestRecovery
        Returns:
        Define whether or not the Task should be re-executed upon execution failure.
        Default:
        false

      • storeDurably

        public abstract boolean storeDurably
        Returns:
        whether or not the Task should remain stored after it is orphaned (no trigger points to it).
        Default:
        false

      • exceptionPolicy

        public abstract ExceptionPolicy exceptionPolicy
        Defines the behavior when exception occurs during the task exception.
        Returns:
        ExceptionPolicy
        Default:
        org.seedstack.scheduler.ExceptionPolicy.NONE

      • triggerName

        public abstract String triggerName
        Returns:
        the Trigger name, must be unique within the group.
        Default:
        "DEFAULT"

      • value

        public abstract String value
        Returns:
        the cron expression to base the schedule on.
        Default:
        ""

      • timeZoneId

        public abstract String timeZoneId
        Returns:
        the time zone for which the cron expression of this trigger will be resolved.
        Default:
        "DEFAULT"

      • priority

        public abstract int priority
        Returns:
        the trigger's priority. When more than one trigger have the same fire time, the scheduler will fire the one with the highest priority first.
        Default:
        0
